title: The Pride of Switzerland
detail_text: <:th_ch0208/>Ta-da! Emma’s special cheese fondue is ready~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Oooh! So this is cheese fondue!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah. Bread crusts, broccoli, potatoes, cherry tomatoes.... Whatever you eat with it will be delicious<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Heee~. Ah, there’s seafood too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>People often eat it with shrimps and scallops. It’s shrimps for today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>If there’s seafood.... then doesn’t that mean it goes well with fish paste too!? I actually brought some as a gift.... Can we try it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Waah! That sounds delicious! Let’s do it~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Nnn~, Buono!! Fish paste is the best~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hey, try putting black pepper on it. It’s spicy and delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>You’re right! You’re very creative, huh, You-chan! Let’s think of other things that go well with fondue!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
